name: TEMPER (Stevannus Lake)
description:
TEMPER

TEMPER is a 2D adventure platformer game that allows players to remember their ways to win the game. TEMPER has 3 main unique features that may not be offered by other 2D adventure platformer games.

✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪

Key Features :

- 14 Unique Pieces Platform

The 14 Unique Pieces Platform which has approximately 196 combinations of challenges and obstacles that are included in the levels.

- Alive Time System

The Alive Time System. Players must keep their time alive as they explore the level. By collecting the correct time items that appear on the level and also to keep away from time killer items, we hope they do not get killed by their own time. 

- Three Hyper Handcrafted Levels

The Three Hyper Handcrafted Levels that are designed based on target experiences that the players will feel and explore. 

Vault, to let the players to feel that they are inside a vault and trying to crack the code to proceed to the next challenge. Sewer, allow the players to explore the sewer that has many ways to get out of there. And Himalaya, to provide a hyper experience through hills and specifically designed obstacles to make the players feel like they are the Himalayan Climbers.

✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪

This game is meant to be played on Windows & Android devices. This game was created for assignment purpose. The assets in this game are built with zero funding and captured from unity default sprites , self-drawn and royalty free sounds websites .

TEMPER by LAKESPRODUCTION ©2019
